title: Backend Developer
description: Looking for a backend developer with experience in Python, FastAPI, SQL, and cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: The candidate should have knowledge in frontend (React) and backend (Node.js, Express) along with database management (PostgreSQL or MongoDB).

title: AI Engineer
description: Experience in machine learning, NLP, Python, PyTorch, and working with transformer-based models is required.

title: Software Engineer
description: Strong problem-solving skills, experience with version control (Git), Agile methodologies, and Java or Python backend systems.
